name: E. So Mean
statement:
.We have hidden a permutation p_1, p_2,
dots, p_n of numbers from 1 to n from you, where n . You can try to
guess it using the following queries:? k a_1 a_2
dots a_k.In response, you will learn if the average of elements with
indexes a_1, a_2,
dots, a_k is an integer. In other words, you will receive 1 if
frac{p_{a_1} + p_{a_2} +
dots + p_{a_k}}{k} is integer, and 0 otherwise. You have to guess the
permutation. You can ask .Note that permutations [p_1, p_2,
dots, p_k] and [n + 1 - p_1, n + 1 - p_2,
dots, n + 1 - p_k] are indistinguishable. Therefore, .Note that the
permutation p is fixed before the start of the interaction and doesn’t
depend on your queries. In other words, .Note that you don’t have to
minimize the number of queries.
